document_data.name: Ryndarth Soleilon II
document_data.deathnotes: Slain by a doppleganger who assumed his form.
document_data.mainbody: '''Ryndarth Soleilon II''', who was also called '''Ryndarth the Younger''' and the '''Masque King''', was the fifth and final King of the [[Soleilon Dynasty]] who ruled the city-state of [[Westgate]].
document_data.Activities: Ryndarth II's reign began with the death of his father, King [[Ryndarth Soleilon I|Ryndarth I]], in {{Yearlink|27}}. However, unbeknownst to the public at the time, a [[doppelganger]] killed Ryndarth II shortly before the death of his father and masqueraded as the prince. The doppleganger ruled Westgate as its king for nearly a year until it was ousted by the [[mulan]] [[Ashtukzu I]].
document_data.Relationships: Ryndarth II died before siring any heirs. The Soleilon line of Kings died with him.
